Package com.exolve.voicesdk

Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
com.exolve.voicesdk.Configuration
public class Configuration extends Object
Configuration used in SDK's initialization method

      Background running mode enabled/disabled state.
      Returns:

    • setEnableBackgroundRunning

      public void setEnableBackgroundRunning(boolean enableBackgroundRunning)
      Enable/disable background running mode. The VoIP service is always running if enabled. Will show notification with the current registration state.
      Parameters:
      enableBackgroundRunning - enable/disable.
      See Also:
      • setNotificationConfiguration(com.exolve.voicesdk.NotificationConfiguration)

    • getEnableTelecomManager

      @Deprecated public boolean getEnableTelecomManager()
      Deprecated.
      Use getTelecomIntegrationMode().
      Telecom manager enabled/disabled state.
      Returns:
      enabled/disabled.

    • setEnableTelecomManager

      @Deprecated public void setEnableTelecomManager(boolean enableTelecomManager)
      Deprecated.
      Use setTelecomIntegrationMode(com.exolve.voicesdk.TelecomIntegrationMode) instead.
      Enable/disable Android TelecomManager SDK's implementation.
      Requires Manifest.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE to place calls.
      Parameters:
      enableTelecomManager - true will enable integration as self-managed service

    • getTelecomIntegrationMode

      public TelecomIntegrationMode getTelecomIntegrationMode()

    • useSecureConnection

      public boolean useSecureConnection()
      Check if a secure connection will be used
      Returns:
      boolean

    • setUseSecureConnection

      public void setUseSecureConnection(boolean useSecureConnection)
      Determines if a server with TLS support should be used (off by default)
      Parameters:
      useSecureConnection - pass false to use SIP server without TLS encryption

    • getEnableRingtone

      public boolean getEnableRingtone()
      Determines if an alert for incoming calls is enabled.
      Returns:
      true if enabled, false otherwise.

    • setEnableRingtone

      public void setEnableRingtone(boolean enableRingtone)
      Toggles an alert for incoming calls. The alert may include a ringtone, vibration or be silent based on the phone settings. Use setRingtoneUri(Uri) to customize ringtone.
      Parameters:
      enableRingtone - true enables alert, false disables it.

    • getRingtoneUri

      public android.net.Uri getRingtoneUri()
      Get ringtone file Uri.
      Returns:
      Uri or null if was not set previously

    • setRingtoneUri

      public void setRingtoneUri(android.net.Uri ringtoneUri)
      Sets the ringtone for the incoming calls using the provided URI.
      Parameters:
      ringtoneUri - Uri of the file to use as ringtone

    • getEnableDetectCallLocation

      public boolean getEnableDetectCallLocation()
      The call's location detect state
      Returns:
      enabled/disabled

    • setEnableDetectCallLocation

      public void setEnableDetectCallLocation(boolean enableDetectCallLocation)
      Enable/disable detect the call's location
      Parameters:
      enableDetectCallLocation - enable(true)/disable(false)
